## GetPublicSuffixOptions.ignoreError property

If set to `true` then any errors that occur while executing [getPublicSuffix()](./tough-cookie.getpublicsuffix.md) will be silently ignored.

**Signature:**

```typescript
ignoreError?: boolean | undefined;
```
